title: Strawberry Balsamic Walnut Baked Brie
steps: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
In a small bowl, combine strawberries and balsamic vinegar.
Place brie wheel on the parchment-lined baking sheet and top with the strawberry mixture.
Top with walnuts and bake for 15 minutes.
Remove from oven and slide brie and parchment paper onto a serving tray.
Top with basil and serve with crostini, crackers, or baguette rounds.
